title: Naval Chief confers awards upon personnel
content:
Six awards of TK(M)-I, 15 awards of TK(M)-II and 07 awards of TK(M)-III have also been conferred upon CPOs and Sailors. Letters of Commendation from Chief of the Naval Staff have been awarded to 50 Officers, CPOs/ Sailors and Navy Civilians.
